reasoning: Waldenström macroglobulinemia is a rare lymphoid neoplasm. Incidence ~0.5-1.0 per 100k based on cancer registry data and hematology studies. More common in elderly populations.
source: Groves FD et al. (2003). Waldenström macroglobulinemia incidence in the United States. Blood. 101(12):4753-4756
